snippet.title: Path of Exile: Necropolis Content Reveal
snippet.description:
In Path of Exile: Necropolis, help Undertaker Arimor lay the spirits of the Eternal Empire to rest and experiment with their souls to create powerful items. 

Our March expansion contains the Necropolis challenge league, New tier 17 Maps, new Transfigured Gems, Quality of Life improvements and much more! 
Find out more at www.pathofexile.com/necropolis
